metadata.description: An extremely fast Python linter and code formatter.

summary: An extremely fast Python linter and code formatter.

options.description: Path to a configuration file (ruff.toml or pyproject.toml).

subcommands.name: check
subcommands.summary: Run Ruff on the given files or directories (default).
subcommands.description: Checks Python files for linting errors.

subcommands.name: rule
subcommands.description: Provides detailed explanations for specific Ruff rules.

subcommands.name: config
subcommands.summary: List or describe the available configuration options.
subcommands.description: Displays available configuration settings for Ruff.

subcommands.name: linter
subcommands.description: Shows the linters Ruff integrates with (e.g., Flake8, PyLint).

subcommands.name: clean
subcommands.summary: Clear any caches used by Ruff.
subcommands.description: Removes cached results to ensure fresh analysis.

subcommands.name: format
subcommands.summary: Run the Ruff formatter on the given files or directories.
subcommands.description: Formats Python code according to configured style.

subcommands.name: server
subcommands.description: Starts the language server protocol (LSP) for editor integration.

subcommands.name: analyze
subcommands.description: Analyzes Python code for complexity and maintainability.

subcommands.name: help
subcommands.summary: Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s).
subcommands.description: Displays help information for Ruff or specific subcommands.
